FBS_GUARDLOCK2 (ENUM)
FBS_GUARDLOCK2 (ENUM)
Â¶
TYPE FBS_GUARDLOCK2 :
Definition of SF_GuardLocking_2 function block states and its diagnostic values.
Attributes:
qualified_only
InOut:
Name
Initial
Comment
IDLE
16#0
The FUNCTION block is NOT active (initial state).
INIT_RESREQ
16#8801
Function block was activated and initiated. NOT (S_Guard =
TRUE AND S_GuardLock = TRUE)
INIT
16#8401
Function block was activated and initiated. (S_Guard = TRUE
AND S_GuardLock = TRUE)
WAIT_FOR_RESET
16#8430
Door is closed and locked, now waiting for operator reset.
WAIT_FOR_OPERATOR
16#8812
Waiting for operator to request to open the door (unlock
request).
GUARD_OPEN_UNLOCKED
16#8822
Lock is released and guard is open.
GUARD_CLOSED_UNLOCKED
16#8832
Lock is released but guard is closed.
WAIT_FOR_UNLOCKED
16#8010
S_UnlockGuard is TRUE, however the acknowledge signal
S_GuardLock is still TRUE (so waiting for acknowledge
<FALSE>)
GUARD_CLOSED_AND_LOCKED
16#8000
Guard is closed and locked.
ERR_RESET_0
16#C001
Static Reset detected in state 0x8x01.
ERR_RESET_1
16#C011
Static Reset detected in state 0xC410.
ERR_RESET_2
16#C021
Static Reset detected in state 0xC420.
ERR_RESET_3
16#C031
Static Reset detected in state 0x8433.
ERR_RESET_4
16#C041
Static Reset detected in state 0xC440.
ERR_GUARD
16#C010
S_GuardLock and S_Guard are not TRUE although the door was
not requested to be opened.
ERR_GUARD_RETURN
16#C410
S_GuardLock and S_Guard become TRUE again after being lost
(0xC010).
ERR_SAFETY_RETURN
16#C420
Safety acknowledge signal becomes TRUE again after being
lost (0xCx50).
ERR_UNLOCK_REQ
16#C440
Waiting time to Unlock exceeded.
ERR_SAFETYLOST_RESREQ
16#C450
Lost safety acknowledge signal with S_Guard = TRUE AND
S_GuardLock = TRUE
ERR_SAFETYLOST
16#C050
Lost safety acknowledge signal with NOT (S_Guard = TRUE AND
S_GuardLock = TRUE)

rows.Name: IDLE
rows.Comment: The FUNCTION block is NOT active (initial state).

rows.Name: INIT_RESREQ
rows.Comment:
Function block was activated and initiated. NOT (S_Guard =
TRUE AND S_GuardLock = TRUE)

rows.Name: INIT
rows.Comment:
Function block was activated and initiated. (S_Guard = TRUE
AND S_GuardLock = TRUE)

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_RESET
rows.Comment: Door is closed and locked, now waiting for operator reset.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_OPERATOR
rows.Comment:
Waiting for operator to request to open the door (unlock
request).

rows.Name: GUARD_OPEN_UNLOCKED
rows.Comment: Lock is released and guard is open.

rows.Name: GUARD_CLOSED_UNLOCKED
rows.Comment: Lock is released but guard is closed.

rows.Name: WAIT_FOR_UNLOCKED
rows.Comment:
S_UnlockGuard is TRUE, however the acknowledge signal
S_GuardLock is still TRUE (so waiting for acknowledge
<FALSE>)

rows.Name: GUARD_CLOSED_AND_LOCKED
rows.Comment: Guard is closed and locked.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_0
rows.Comment: Static Reset detected in state 0x8x01.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_1
rows.Comment: Static Reset detected in state 0xC410.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_2
rows.Comment: Static Reset detected in state 0xC420.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_3
rows.Comment: Static Reset detected in state 0x8433.

rows.Name: ERR_RESET_4
rows.Comment: Static Reset detected in state 0xC440.

rows.Name: ERR_GUARD
rows.Comment:
S_GuardLock and S_Guard are not TRUE although the door was
not requested to be opened.

rows.Name: ERR_GUARD_RETURN
rows.Comment:
S_GuardLock and S_Guard become TRUE again after being lost
(0xC010).

rows.Name: ERR_SAFETY_RETURN
rows.Comment:
Safety acknowledge signal becomes TRUE again after being
lost (0xCx50).

rows.Name: ERR_UNLOCK_REQ
rows.Comment: Waiting time to Unlock exceeded.

rows.Name: ERR_SAFETYLOST_RESREQ
rows.Comment:
Lost safety acknowledge signal with S_Guard = TRUE AND
S_GuardLock = TRUE

rows.Name: ERR_SAFETYLOST
rows.Comment:
Lost safety acknowledge signal with NOT (S_Guard = TRUE AND
S_GuardLock = TRUE)
